column2: Juniper Networks shares could climb 30 pct-Barron's NEW YORK
column3: July 20 Shares in network equipment maker Juniper Networks Inc. could rise 30 percent or more due to lower valuation relative to its peers and improving prospects
column4: Barrons' magazine reported over the weekend.

column5: July 20 Mondelez International Inc  and D.E Master Blenders 1753 are considering options including a possible sale of French coffee brands L'Or and Grand Mere as they prepare to merge their coffee businesses
column6: sources familiar with the matter said.

column2: UPDATE 1-'Apes' rules North American box office for second straight weekend LOS ANGELES/NEW YORK
column3: July 20 Sci-fi sequel "Dawn of the Planet of the Apes" beat a new horror flick
column4: an animated family film and an adult comedy to keep its grip on the U.S. and Canadian box office title for a second straight weekend.
